films.title: Gone with the Wind
films.quote: Frankly, my dear, I don't give a damn.

films.title: The Godfather
films.quote: I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse.

films.title: Dirty Harry
films.quote: You've got to ask yourself one question: 'Do I feel lucky?' Well, do ya, punk?

films.title: Jerry Maguire
films.quote: You had me at 'hello.'

films.title: The Wizard of Oz
films.quote: Toto, I've a feeling we're not in Kansas anymore.

films.title: Wall Street
films.quote: Greed, for lack of a better word, is good.

films.title: Taxi Driver
films.quote: You talking to me?

films.title: Scarface
films.quote: Say 'hello' to my little friend!

films.title: The Shining
films.quote: Here's Johnny!

films.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
films.quote: Hasta la vista, baby.

films.title: A Few Good Men
films.quote: You can't handle the truth!

films.title: Rocky
films.quote: Yo, Adrian!

films.title: Jaws
films.quote: You're gonna need a bigger boat.

films.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
films.quote: My precious.

films.title: Forrest Gump
films.quote: My mama always said life was like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.

films.title: The Sixth Sense
films.quote: I see dead people.

films.title: Top Gun
films.quote: I feel the need - the need for speed!

films.title: Dirty Dancing
films.quote: Nobody puts Baby in a corner.

films.title: Titanic
films.quote: I'm the king of the world!

films.title: Shrek
films.quote: Ogres are like onions.

films.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
films.quote: No, I am your father.

films.title: Pulp Fiction
films.quote: English, motherf***er, do you speak it?

films.title: The Dark Knight
films.quote: Why so serious?

films.title: Casablanca
films.quote: Here's looking at you, kid.

films.title: Fight Club
films.quote: The first rule of Fight Club is: You do not talk about Fight Club.

films.title: The Matrix
films.quote: There is no spoon.

films.title: Braveheart
films.quote: They may take our lives, but they'll never take our freedom!

films.title: Gladiator
films.quote: Are you not entertained?

films.title: V for Vendetta
films.quote: Remember, remember, the Fifth of November.

films.title: Apollo 13
films.quote: Houston, we have a problem.

films.title: The Lion King
films.quote: Hakuna Matata.

films.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
films.quote: This is the day you will always remember as the day you almost caught Captain Jack Sparrow!

films.title: Back to the Future
films.quote: Roads? Where we're going, we don't need roads.

films.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
films.quote: E.T. phone home.

films.title: The Silence of the Lambs
films.quote: I do wish we could chat longer, but I'm having an old friend for dinner.

films.title: The Princess Bride
films.quote: Hello. My name is Inigo Montoya. You killed my father. Prepare to die.
